Title: Establishes the COVID heroes grant program
Summary: Establishes the COVID heroes grant program to award a lump sum pay differential of $2,500 to essential SUNY hospital employees who worked during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency.
LawCode: Amd ยง130, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to establishing the COVID heroes grant program
